author: benh
msg: Scripts to start and stop pbs_mom on each slave

author: benh
msg: Removed ugly torque hack, added sleep in hopes to eliminate non deterministic framework failure at startup because pbs_server doesn't get started completely.

author: benh
msg: Torque framework now kills tasks correctly, also writes its own event_log showing how many nodes (i.e. tasks, which are all on distinct nodes) it currently has.

author: benh
msg: Changing behavior of killTask() so that it doesn't call LOG(FATAL) no matter what right away. I.e. changing it to LOG(INFO).

author: benh
msg: Added python logging so that subsets of logging can be turned on and off.
